pullRequest.title: [amazonechocontrol] fix unnecessary refresh and add text commands
pullRequest.bodyText: This fixes an issue with lagging announcements due to traffic caused by unnecessary refreshes and also adds a new feature: text commands. With text commands openhab can execute commands on alexas as if they were spoken by the user. It would be really helpful to have this in OH3.
